programme.title: Racial tensions in New York
programme.short_synopsis: Can the racial tensions in New York City ever be calmed, or even understood?
programme.medium_synopsis: The history of racial tensions in New York, the gap between policy ideals and their reality and the chaos caused by the presidential visits to the city.
